text: titanaka, iman kontarkale avarkalukkum; yutarkalakavum, sapiyinkalakavum, kiristavarkalakavum, majusikalakavum anarkale avarkalukkum, inaivaipporay iruntarkale avarkalukkum itaiyil (yar nervaliyil iruntarkal enpatu parri) niccayamaka allah kiyama nalil tirppuk kuruvan; niccayamaka allah ovvoru porulin mitum catciyamaka irukkiran
